description: Example payload for n8n integration with the trading signal service

AAPL crushing earnings again. Consistent performer.

n8n_workflow_tips: 1. Use Reddit node to fetch recent comments from r/stocks or r/wallstreetbets
2. Filter comments to extract text content into an array
3. Use HTTP Request node to call this API with ticker and posts
4. Parse response and route based on signal type (BUY/HOLD/NEUTRAL)
5. For BUY signals, trigger notification or execute trade action
6. Log all signals to a database or spreadsheet for tracking
